product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This vibrant and playful banner design promotes a toy product in a fantasy-themed setting. The background features a pastel pink base with flowing wave shapes and soft translucent circles in pink, violet, blue, and mint green, giving a dreamy aesthetic. The top of the banner showcases a bold title text layer ("heading") in bright magenta with a childlike, comic-inspired font. Just below, a subtitle text layer ("subheading") in a clean, uppercase purple font adds clarity on the product theme. The centerpiece is a colorful toy image ("product_image") depicting a kitty playground. The bottom features a prominent price ("price") in bold magenta and a matching rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_button") labeled with white text ("cta"). The design is cohesive, bright, and appeals directly to young audiences and parents alike.

**Color Palette:**
- Pastel Pink: `#FFE6F2`
- Hot Pink / Magenta: `#FF1493`
- Light Pink: `#FFB6C1`
- Lilac / Lavender: `#9370DB`
- Light Blue: `#87CEEB`
- Light Green: `#77DD77`
- Deep Purple: `#8A2BE2`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a playful, tropical-themed cat playset with a vibrant and eye-catching color palette perfect for a cheerful advertisement banner. Dominant colors include hot pink (#EF4CA6) used in the upper cat house, bright green (#2FBF71) for the tree leaves, sandy beige (#F2C89C) for the base and structure, and sky blue (#3CCECE) in the hammock and feeding bowl. Soft purples (#B693E8) seen in the paw sign and accessories blend harmoniously with gentle pastels while still standing out. These colors contrast delightfully, creating an exciting visual appeal while maintaining a cohesive, playful theme ideal for young audiences.
